data.content: Handoff capsule (2026-02-18): fixed doctor --fix questionnaire flow in launcher template. Changes in scripts/install.sh: (1) render_doctor_report now uses node /dev/fd/3 so JSON response reaches parser; (2) questionnaire parser reads diagnostics from temp file and prompts via stdin instead of /dev/tty split stream; (3) non-TTY fallback auto-selects default strategies; (4) temp file cleanup added. Validation: bash -n scripts/install.sh; HOME=/tmp/foolery-home-ryv0 FOOLERY_DEV_PORT=3316 bash scripts/test-doctor-stream.sh --fix with piped yes shows "1 succeeded"; interactive expect run on port 3317 also shows fix success.
